text: Yastava konatyahi vastine imana rakhale nahi ki imana rakhale tyancyasathi labhadayaka tharale asate, yunusacya janasamuhakherija. Jevha tyanni imana rakhale tevha amhi apamanaca azaba (prakopa) ya jagacya jivanata tyancya varuna hatavila ani tyanna eka (niscita) veleparyanta sukha bhoganyaca avasara dila
